Job description
A job description defines the duties and responsibilities of a
staff member.  It also indicates who is the supervisor as wellas who is supervised.
Example of a job description:
Job Description
Job title:   Supervising Public Health Nurse
Organization:  Department of  HealthDesignation:Nu
